FuncDef:
The snmp-agent sys-info command configures SNMP system information.
The undo snmp-agent sys-info command restores the default SNMP system information.
By default, the system maintenance information is "R&D Beijing, Huawei Technologies Co.,Ltd.", the system location is "Beijing China".

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies contact information of system maintenance.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 characters, with spaces supported.

Specifies the location of a device.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 characters, with spaces supported.

Examples: [~HUAWEI] snmp-agent sys-info contact call Operator at 010-12345678
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure the contact information for a managed node, run the snmp-agent sys-info contact command.
To configure the physical location of a node, run the snmp-agent sys-info location command.
